text:
Ranjon Ghoshal (; 7 June 1955 – 9 July 2020) was an Indian theatre director and musician. He was a founder member of the Bengali band Moheener Ghoraguli. He ran an advertising agency, Mareech Advertising in Bangalore and Forum Three, a theatre group. He was born in West Bengal, India.
In October 2019, Ghoshal was accused of sexual harassment by many women.
Ghoshal died on 9 July 2020, aged 65.
